<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:8c03d1002f341110465d50492799b65d</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>movie rental limit per rental period</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }

    var movies = g_form.getValue('select_movies_to_rent').split(',');
    var titles = [];

    function titleParse(response) {
        var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
		g_form.addInfoMessage('answer ' + answer);
    }

    if (movies.length > 5) {
        g_form.addErrorMessage('Movie rentals are limited to 5 per rental period');
        movies.splice(movies.length - 2);

        var ga = new GlideAjax('MovieIDtoTitle');
        ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getTitle');
        //ga.addParam('sysparm_mList', movies);
        ga.getXML(titleParse);

        //g_form.addInfoMessage('titles' + titles);
        //g_form.setValue('select_movies_to_rent', movies);
    }

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jgonzalez</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-27 00:50:35</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>62a09afb2f341110465d50492799b646</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>movie rental limit per rental period</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="BlockBuster" source="x_809069_bbuster">e9ebfa912f201110465d50492799b6fb</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="BlockBuster">e9ebfa912f201110465d50492799b6fb</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_62a09afb2f341110465d50492799b646</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jgonzalez</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-07-27 00:56:28</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="Movie variable set">b3f73b592fa01110465d50492799b635</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
